card.intro.title: Introduction to Wind Turbines concepts
card.grid.title2: Electric Grid and Wind Farms concepts
card.grid.title3: Access to Real-Time Wind Turbine Simulators
concepts.mindmap.h3: Mind Map with key works on Wind Energy
concepts.mindmap.p: This mind-map presents an structural view of the essential technical, operational, and technological aspects of wind energy, serving as a complete reference for planning, training, and decisionâ€‘making.
concepts.intro.family: Introduction to Wind Turbine families and their evolution
concepts.title: Introduction to Wind Energy Concepts
tutorials.directaccess.title: Direct access to the Tutorials
tutorials.directaccess.p: The Tutorials are a key component of the product line of ACM SL. They normally are associated to the Real-Time Simulators and Applications, and can be access from whitin them: here you can access them directly.
scada.guide.title: Guided exploration of the Wind Farm Control Center/SCADA
guided.learning.title: Access to Guided learning and suggested Experiments
guided.learning.p: You will find in this section sets of Guided tours around the Tutorials, as well as Suggested Experiments described in the Tutorials
windfarms.title: The Wind Farms and the Electric Grid
windfarms.p: Wind farms serve as the fundamental production units, supplying their generated power directly to the Transmission Tetwork of the Electric Grid.
turbinefamilies.title: Families of Wind Turbines in Wind Farms
turbinefamilies.p: You have a introductory presentation in Families of Wind Turbines
drivetrain.title: On the Wind Turbine Drivetrain
drivetrain.p: Documentation about the Drive Train, and access to the tool for designing and for studiying its Operational Curve (Blade rpms versus Wind Speed)
b2b.title: Power Electronics Back-to-Back converters
b2b.p: Program to compute the demand on Back-to-Back converters when connected to a Asynchronous Induction Machine, in DFIG Wind Turbines.
videos.title: Wind Turbine related videos
videos.p: Select a video to watch. Titles come from Videos.txt.
simulator.wfscada.p: This simulator, together with its Tutorial, enables users to understand the Wind Farm components, their operational roles, and the way they interact with one another and with the Electric Grid.
tutorial.family.path: C:\ACMSL\WindFarmSimulator\conf\Training in Industrial aspects of Wind Energy\WindTurbineFamilies.htmle
mindmap.windenergy.path: C:\ACMSL\ACM SL Wind Energy Applications\English\files\Training in Industrial aspects of Wind Energy.mm
tutorials.windfarm_scada.h3: Access to the 'Wind Farm Control Center/SCADA' Simulator' Tutorial
tutorials.windfarm_scada.p1: While the Wind Farm Control Center/SCADA Simulator includes builtâ€‘in access to its tutorial, this option lets users open the tutorial separately, without launching the simulator itself.
tutorials.windfarm_scada.p2: And about the main characteristics of the Electic Grid affecting the operation of the Wind Farm.
tutorials.windfarm_scada.button: ðŸ“– Open the 'Wind Farm Control Center/SCADA' Tutorial
tutorial.wfsscada.button: ðŸ“– Open the 'Wind Farm Control Center/SCADA' Simulator's Tutorial
tutorials.dsaswt.h3: Tutorial of the 'Real-Time Dual Speed Active Stall WT Simulator'
tutorials.dsaswt.p1: In this tutorial you will find the description of:
tutorials.dsaswt.p2: * the most common subsystems in a modern WT
tutorials.dsaswt.p3: * the description of its working conditions
tutorials.dsaswt.p4: * the basis of the asynchronous induction generator
tutorials.dsaswt.button: ðŸ“– Open the 'Real-Time Dual Speed Active-Stall WT Simulator' Tutorial
tutorials.rrcwt.h3: Tutorial of the 'Real-Time Rotor Resistance Controlled WT Simulator'
tutorials.rrcwt.p1: This WT family constitutes an important step in the development of modern WTs, like DFIGs.
tutorials.rrcwt.p2: It uses a common characteristic of the Asynchronous Induction Generators to solve the problem of using the Drive Train as an energy storage device to cope with the problems associated with wind gusts.
tutorials.rrcwt.button: ðŸ“– Open the 'Real-Time Rotor Resistance Controlled WT Simulator' Tutorial
tutorials.dfigwt.h3: Tutorial of the 'Real-Time Doubly-Fed Induction Generator WT Simulator'
tutorials.dfigwt.p1: This WT family constitutes the vast majority of the WTs installed on Wind Farms, world-wide.
tutorials.dfigwt.p2: It is a complex production plant that exploit the capabilities of modern Power Electronics.
tutorials.dfigwt.button: ðŸ“– Open the 'Real-Time Doubly-Fed Induction Generator WT Simulator' Tutorial
tutorials.ldpframework.p1: All the Real-Time simulators of ACMSL are based on the framework LdP, developed by ACM SL, that poses unique functionalities for the development of Real-Time Simulators, that, in turn, are based on Digital Twins
tutorials.ldpframework.p2: In this tutorial you have a description of its characteristics.
tutorials.ldpframework.button: ðŸ“– Open the 'Real-Time Doubly-Fed Induction Generator WT Simulator' Tutorial
